trans-unit.source: Interacts with the parser to build a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 分析器以生成与交互<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily for control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此类主要用于控件开发人员。

trans-unit.source: To create a custom control builder for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> derived control, you need to inherit from this class.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的自定义控件生成器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>派生的控件，你需要从类继承</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder"></xref> class.
Determines whether the control builder should process the white space literals that are represented by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 确定控件生成器是否应处理由表示的空白文本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The AllowWhitespaceLiterals method overrides the inherited implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to always indicate that white spaces in the text that are associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control are not represented by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal?displayProperty=fullName> objects.
trans-unit.target: AllowWhitespaceLiterals 方法重写继承的实现<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，以始终指示与关联的文本中的空白<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控件不由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal?displayProperty=fullName>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified literal content to a control.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的文本内容添加到控件。

trans-unit.source: The AppendLiteralString method is called by the ASP.NET page framework.
trans-unit.target: 由 ASP.NET 页面框架调用 AppendLiteralString 方法。

trans-unit.source: If the string is white space, it is handled according to the setting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串为空白，则根据进行处理的设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is treated as if the inner text represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它将被视为内部的文本表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content to add to the control.
The string literal is not well formed.
trans-unit.target: 字符串文本的格式不正确。

trans-unit.source: Throws <xref href="System.Web.HttpException"></xref>, because adding child control builders does not apply to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.HttpException"> </xref>，这是因为添加子控件生成器不适用于<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> base class, this method adds the builders of all child controls associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control to the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>基类，此方法将添加与关联的所有子控件的生成器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控件添加到指定<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder?displayProperty=fullName>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This method is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder?displayProperty=fullName> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 从<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder?displayProperty=fullName>类并不适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder></xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder?displayProperty=fullName>继承此方法

trans-unit.source: In the overridden implementation in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder>, the method always throws <xref:System.Web.HttpException>.
trans-unit.target: 在重写实现中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder>，该方法始终引发<xref:System.Web.HttpException>.</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref> object to add the child control builders to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"> </xref>要添加到的子控件生成器对象。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to use this method.
